content: 2nd chain from hook and next chain 2 slip_stitch slip_stitch same chain as last sl sts from first two toes to finish slip_stitch in each chain back to the beginning of the starter chain 5 slip_stitch finish off leaving a tail long enough to sew foot to body weave in the other end or sew with both strands if desired assembly and finishing position beak wings feet and tail as desired and sew to head/body embroider eyes
